Name: Deauville (Difford's)
Ingredients: 20 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A calvados-influenced riff on the Sidecar , or a cognac-influenced riff on the Apple Cart . Either way, served in a more bite-sized portion.
History: My version of the classic Deauville .
Nutrition: One serving of Deauville (Difford's) contains 147 calories
